Published: Mar 6, 2025 |  at  05:06 AM

The Klimabonus (Climate Bonus) is a financial support given by the Austrian government as part of its environmental policies. If you live in Austria, you might be eligible for this bonus, including students!

âœ… What Is the Klimabonus?

âœ”ï¸ A yearly financial bonus given to all Austrian residents.
âœ”ï¸ Amount depends on your location and environmental impact (â‚¬110â€“â‚¬220).
âœ”ï¸ Paid automatically via bank transfer or postal voucher (Scheck).
âœ”ï¸ To receive it automatically in your bank account, you must have a FinanzOnline account linked to your IBAN.

ğŸ¯ Who Is Eligible for Klimabonus?

To receive Klimabonus, you must:
âœ”ï¸ Have lived in Austria for at least 183 days (6 months) in the previous calendar year.
âœ”ï¸ Have a registered address (Meldezettel) in Austria.
âœ”ï¸ Be an Austrian citizen or legal resident (including students with residence permits).

ğŸ’¡ Students with valid residence permits can apply if they have lived in Austria for at least 6 months!

ğŸ’° How Much Money Can You Get?

LocationKlimabonus Amount
Big cities (Vienna, Graz, Linz)â‚¬110
Small towns & villagesâ‚¬150 â€“ â‚¬220

ğŸ’¡ If you live in Vienna, you will receive â‚¬110.
ğŸ’¡ If you live in a rural area, you may get up to â‚¬220.

ğŸ“Œ How to Get the Klimabonus?

1ï¸âƒ£ Automatic Payment via Bank Transfer

ğŸ’¡ To receive Klimabonus directly in your bank account, you must have:
âœ”ï¸ A FinanzOnline account
âœ”ï¸ Your IBAN (bank account) linked to FinanzOnline

ğŸ”— How to create a FinanzOnline account? Click here for the full guide

If your bank account is registered in FinanzOnline, the money will be transferred automatically.

2ï¸âƒ£ Postal Voucher (Scheck) â€“ If No Bank Account is Registered

  • If your bank account is not registered in FinanzOnline, you will receive a voucher (Scheck) by mail.
  • You can cash the voucher at any Austrian post office (Ã–sterreichische Post).

3ï¸âƒ£ Request Your Klimabonus Manually

If you did not receive the Klimabonus, you need to apply manually:

ğŸ”— Apply here: Klimabonus Request Form

âš ï¸ Common Issues & Solutions

ğŸ“ Klimabonus Contact & Support

ğŸ“ Official Website: www.klimabonus.gv.at

ğŸ’¡ If the contact form is not working, try calling the helpline or emailing them directly!

ğŸ“ Where to Get Help?

  • Visit your local Magistrat or Finanzamt for verification.
  • Call the Klimabonus Helpline.
  • Ask for help in our student community!

ğŸ“¢ Join Our WhatsApp Group for more tips!

ğŸ”— Final Summary: How to Get Klimabonus

âœ”ï¸ Live in Austria for at least 183 days (6 months)
âœ”ï¸ Register your address (Meldezettel)
âœ”ï¸ Create a FinanzOnline account & link your IBAN to receive automatic payments
âœ”ï¸ If no bank account is registered, you will receive a voucher by post
âœ”ï¸ If you donâ€™t receive it, apply manually on the Klimabonus website

ğŸ‰ Now You Know How to Claim Your Klimabonus!
If you meet the requirements, you should receive the Klimabonus automatically. If not, follow the steps to request it manually.
